title: TogglePlayCommand
description: Toggle the play state. Can optionally set the media player to the absolute "play" or "pause" state.

command_name.title: Command Name
command_name.description: Command sub-type - e.g. the command to perform.

play_state.title: Play State
play_state.description: Optional field which indicates whether the server should play or pause. If unset, the server picks the opposite of the current state.
